relatedFiles.editedTogether.isEnabled.description: Enable suggestions based on files edited together

relatedFiles.editedTogether.numberOfSugg.description: Number of suggestions to show for edited together files

relatedFiles.editedTogether.numberOfComm.description: Number of commits to look back to find related files

relatedFiles.editedTogether.maxFilesPerC.description: Ignore commits when the number of files edited is above this threshold

relatedFiles.editedTogether.heuristics.r.description: Factor that increases heuristics when the file is edited multiple times. Must be >= 1

relatedFiles.editedTogether.heuristics.o.description: Factor that reduces heuristics for older commits. Must be <= 1

relatedFiles.similarNames.isEnabled.description: Enable suggestions based on files with similar names

relatedFiles.similarNames.numberOfSugges.description: Number of suggestions to show for files with similar names

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
